services.name: Radar Recorder Service
services.description: This service provide the capabilty to record the radar data to a file.

services.name: Camera Recorder Service
services.description: This service provide the capabilty to record a camera.

services.name: Human Detection
services.description: This service use an AI model in order to determin if an object seen by radar is a human.

services.name: Human Pose Estimation
services.description: This service use an AI model in order to determin a human pose.

services.name: Biometric Gate ID - Closed Set
services.description: This service use an AI model for identifying person ID based on gate movement.

services.name: Biometric Gate ID - Open Set
services.description: This service use an AI model for identifying person ID based on gate movement.

services.name: Smart Fan Gestures
services.description: This service use an AI model for identifying gestures against smart fan.
